description.value:
Trigger The beyond terror appears

Effect A swirling green energy emerges from the world mirror, roiling through the air with a wail of confusion and fear. All creatures within 30 feet of the world mirror become @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 1} unless they succeed at a @Check[will|dc:16] save. The haunt then rolls initiative.

details.description: The collective minds of Luvoth's sapient inhabitants lash out at the unknown in a storm of psychic confusion, fear, anger and pain.
details.disable: @Check[arcana|dc:16], @Check[nature|dc:16], @Check[religion|dc:16] or @Check[occultism|dc:16] (trained) to soothe the restless emotions with prayer, meditative chanting, or magical rituals; three total checks are required to disable the hazard. The hazard is permanently disabled when the beyond terror is defeated.

publication.title: Starfinder Society Scenario #1-02: Mystery of the Frozen Moon

details.reset: The hazard remains active as long as the beyond terror is alive and doesn't reset once it's disabled or the beyond terror is defeated.
details.routine: (1 action) On each of its turns, the hazard targets one of the PCs at random, dealing @Damage[2d4[mental]] damage with a @Check[will|dc:16|basic] save. On a failure, the target also becomes @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 1}; on a critical failure, they become @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 2}.
